Flexible expression server module

mod_flexpr_server.Rd

A Shiny module that manages flexible expressions.

Usage

mod_flexpr_server(
  id,
  get_value,
  get_cols,
  get_cols_expr = get_cols,
  submit = TRUE
)

Arguments

id

The module ID

get_value

Function that returns initial values

get_cols

Function that returns column names for autocompletion

get_cols_expr

Function that returns column names for expression autocompletion (defaults to get_cols)

submit

Whether to show a submit button (defaults to TRUE)

Value

A reactive expression containing the current expressions

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
serve(new_flexpr_block(), list(data = mtcars))
} # }
